name: FastLap Clicker
description:
FASTLAP CLICKER

Using your mouse click the BOOST when your car is nearest to it to gain speed.

Try to build up speed to get a FASTEST LAP but beware too much speed can meet a terrible off-track crash!

Please vote here:

https://itch.io/jam/1-bit-clicker-jam/rate/133101
